tool_description: Get prices of products at a number of South African retailers by searching the barcodes, product ID's  / Product Sku's or product page URL's
title: Price Tracker South Africa

api_list.name: getProductSku
api_list.description: Return prices based on Product ID or Product Sku
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_product_sku/{product_sku}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getProductURL
api_list.description:
Return prices based on the url of the product page on the retailers website.

NOTE: replace all / with a +
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_product_url/{product_url}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getBarcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/{barcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "price-tracker-south-africa.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
